mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental( rental_code, book_code, rental_start, rental_end, member_id, rental_payment ) VALUES ( #{rentalCode}, #{bookCode}, #{rentalStart}, #{rentalEnd}, #{memberId}, #{rentalPayment} )
mapper.select: SELECT rental_code as rentalCode, rental.book_code as bookCode, book.book_name as bookName, member.member_name as memberName, rental_payment as rentalPayment, rental_start as rentalStart, memberlevel.price as memberLevelPrice FROM rental JOIN book ON rental.book_code=book.book_code JOIN member ON rental.member_id=member.member_id JOIN memberlevel ON member.member_id=memberlevel.memberlevel_no WHERE rental.book_code=#{bookCode} && rentalstate_no !=2
mapper.update: UPDATE rental SET rentalstate_no=2, rental_payment=#{totalPrice}, rental_end=sysdate() WHERE rental_code=#{rentalCode}
